name: DeFeet Levitator Trail 6" Socks - Unisex
description:
Gear up for the trails. Made using a quick-drying merino wool blend to keep your feet warm and dry when you’re out chasing fall’s hero dirt. Tall cuff protects your ankles from hungry pedals and flying debris.Light and warm merino and synthetic blend dries quickly, wicks moisture and breathes well.High-density forefoot padding cushions every bump.15cm cuffs shield ankles from the worst pedal bites.

        Sustainability
